sense.gloss: whereabouts, place where one is, position, location

sdata.j: ↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓は↑税金↑↓ぜいきん↓↑上↑↓じょう↓の↑目的↑↓もくてき↓で↑本社|↑↓ほんしゃ↓↑所在|地↑↓しょざいち↓を↑香港↑↓ほんこん↓に↑移↑↓うつ↓した。
sdata.e: The company moved its corporate domicile to Hong Kong for tax purposes.

sdata.e: Missing for years, the document miraculously came to light the other day.
